instructions: Open your phone app and go to the keypad. Tap the three dots in the upper right-hand corner, then tap Settings . Based on your phone, tap either Call Settings or Phone Settings . Tap Caller ID > Hide caller . If you don't see Caller ID, look for and tap either Advanced Settings or Additional Settings .
Open Settings . Tap Phone > Show My Caller ID . Tap the Show My Caller ID toggle to disable the feature.
